title: By developers for developers
text: Lesli is built and maintained according to high-quality software development standards.

content.name: UI Templates
content.text: Just copy and paste the examples to quickly build a beautiful app.

content.name: Responsive Design
content.text: Our interfaces work perfectly on all devices.

content.name: Complete Test Coverage
content.text: We implement a comprehensive suite of automated unit and integration tests to ensure your software is bug-free.

content.name: Software up to date
content.text: We work with the latest versions of the tools.
